product_details.name: Buds_Explore
product_details.desc: Up To 50 hours of playtime, Quad mic with ENC, 12mm Driver, Instacharge, Rugged Look

Battery_Charging.playtime: Up to 8 hours at 70% volume on a single charge and an additional 42 hours with the charging case

Comfort.Controls: On ear touch control (Volume, Music, Call control feature on both earbuds, Siri and Google Assistant)

Reviews.name: Ayush Das
Reviews.contant: Liked a lot The bass, battery backup, ANC, ENC, Transparency Mode and the design all are perfect and are up to mark and enough for daily use. The weight is also not an issue as it is very light weight. #ShunoDilKaShor
